channel.title: Exitscape ( SILABSOFT PKING )
channel.description:
A lot of the 200 players from Exitscape - 3 years ago - that still have contact with me, has been messaging me to release Exitscape as i was one of the 3 staff who has the source.
You may not like this source anymore, but before 317 and 508 came out, this was one of the most loved sources. now this source is hardly found anymore...
- but if you are a silab/mopar fan, you will LOVE this source.
Features -
- Silab items - 3rd age, void, runite crossbow, dbow etc - all working/ with fair bonuses + dbow, gs spec. - PK sever - you wont be able to find any skilling D : - Jad - hits fairly higher. will need team - KBD - you will need antidragon-fire shield - Mith Drags - drops rares - Kqueen + warriors - kqueen drops holiday items? - Hell - pkspot - Edge - 1vs1 - Varrock - multi-pking zone - Skill capes - Skill hoods - Veng - Zamorak Give me Strength - extra hit bonus. +++ Hate it when someone runs for your fight? WELL YOU CAN BARRAGE THEM IN SAFEZONE IF THEY DO +++
Some Helpful Sever Tools
- SHOPMAKER ( this allows you to make some ACUTALLY NEW SHOPS. unlike all the other severs with the same shops... ) - AUTOSPAWN GENERATOR - VOULE AUTO RESTARTER
Im not really in the mood for posting pics... cause im still working on DarkFalls minor glitches... but ill post this one pic. maybe itll convince you to download this... :D
[IMG]http://i269.photobucket.com/albums/jj67/E_M_O_2008/ex01.jpg[/img]
[IMG]http://i269.photobucket.com/albums/jj67/E_M_O_2008/ex02.jpg[/img]
iunno. you can just DL it to take Shopmake idc tbh xD
CLIENT : http://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,204094.0.html
SOURCE : http://www.mediafire.com/?emzgwrgzmmy
[b]CREDITS[/b]
CLIENT : 100% Miss SilabSoft
SOURCE : 5% JayMaker 15% $hane$cape 35% Phantasy 20% Miles24 25% Exitwound
- Hope you like.

item.title: Exitscape ( SILABSOFT PKING )

item.description:
@Gone_sources wrote:

A lot of the 200 players from Exitscape - 3 years ago - that still have contact with me, has been messaging me to release Exitscape as i was one of the 3 staff who has the source.

You may not like this source anymore, but before 317 and 508 came out, this was one of the most loved sources. now this source is hardly found anymore…

  • but if you are a silab/mopar fan, you will LOVE this source.

Features -

  • Silab items - 3rd age, void, runite crossbow, dbow etc - all working/ with fair bonuses + dbow, gs spec.
  • PK sever - you wont be able to find any skilling D :
  • Jad - hits fairly higher. will need team
  • KBD - you will need antidragon-fire shield
  • Mith Drags - drops rares
  • Kqueen + warriors - kqueen drops holiday items?
  • Hell - pkspot
  • Edge - 1vs1
  • Varrock - multi-pking zone
  • Skill capes
  • Skill hoods
  • Veng
  • Zamorak Give me Strength - extra hit bonus.
    +++ Hate it when someone runs for your fight? WELL YOU CAN BARRAGE THEM IN SAFEZONE IF THEY DO +++

Some Helpful Sever Tools

  • SHOPMAKER ( this allows you to make some ACUTALLY NEW SHOPS. unlike all the other severs with the same shops… )
  • AUTOSPAWN GENERATOR
  • VOULE AUTO RESTARTER

Im not really in the mood for posting pics… cause im still working on DarkFalls minor glitches… but ill post this one pic. maybe itll convince you to download this…
